alert.note: Alert for Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 7:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Williamsburg County through 830 PM EDT... At 739 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hebron, or 10 miles northwest of Kingstree, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingstree, Cades, Salters, Hebron, and Williamsburg Regional Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
